question: NHL: Detroit Red Wings vs. Boston Bruins 2023-03-12
description:
In the upcoming NHL game, scheduled for March 12 at 1:30 PM ET:

If the Detroit Red Wings win, the market will resolve to “Red Wings”.

If the Boston Bruins win, the market will resolve to “Bruins”.

 If the game is not completed by April 21, 2023 (11:59:59 PM ET), the market will resolve 50-50.
